AzureBlade: That...  can't happen... I'm afraid that what I did was 
only show her the way. I can't show myself the way, and besides, I 
can't be reprogrammed as a Pred; I'm already half-pred myself. If 
there really is something, we'll have to find another way.

> : : Rodimus Prime : :
>

capable of doing the same with yourself? That could help.
> 
>
